channel.title: Can anyone else get elevators working?
channel.description: I can make it go up using timing etc, but it wont go down :(

item.title: Can anyone else get elevators working?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:8, topic:401660”]The problem being compressed sticky pistons do not have their sticky properties[/quote]The wiki has updated with this, and it does seem to be possible but with increasing complexity as you add more pistons. It doesn’t even state if it’s a bug or not

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone else get elevators working?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:6, topic:401660”][quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=498720.msg3647011#msg3647011 date=1309461518]

sticky pistons, in the crafting grid place a piston and place some slime thing above it.
[/quote]I know, it works for two pistons but when you have more it doesn’t pull them all down. I’ve tried messing with timing but nothing works.

Protip: You can only push/pull fully contracted pistons. [/quote]I know… has anyone actually done it with more than 2 pistons?

Read full topic
item.source: Can anyone else get elevators working?

[/quote]I know, it works for two pistons but when you have more it doesn’t pull them all down. I’ve tried messing with timing but nothing works.[/quote]
Protip: You can only push/pull fully contracted pistons.
